tool_description: Instantly verify emails entered at your site. Ensure that your customers didn’t mistype the address or forgot to enter part of the e-mail. Check MX records, disposable or free e-mails, catch-all addresses, etc. In compliance with GDPR emalidate does not store checked addresses at any point.
name: Emalidate
title: Emalidate

api_list.name: verifyemailaddresswithtoken
api_list.description: Verifies email address using authorization token

optional_parameters.name: cca
optional_parameters.description: Signals API whether or not to check if server has \"catch all\" address (1- check, 0-do not check)

api_list.name: validateemailaddresswithtoken
api_list.description: Email syntax validation using authorization token
